text: Books spread open, screen aglow Guided by a voice I know Algorithms softly speak Guiding me toward the peak Data streams like words unwind Connections sparking in my mind Patterns form beneath the glow AI shows me how to grow Every page, a neural link Every thought aligned in sync Steady rhythm, steady heart With you, learning is an art Focus flow, AI study mode Knowledge growing, paths unfold You and me, the perfect code In this gentle focus flow Focus flow, let the noise erode Quiet mind, productivity bestowed Together, clarity bestowed AI, guide my focus flow Notes arranged by unseen hands Prompting deeper understand In quiet spaces, we create Ideas form and innovate You suggest, I refine Feedback loops in steady time Optimized and reassured Progress steady, calm, secured Every fact, a stepping stone Every challenge quickly known Steady pace, steady climb Together, clarity aligned Focus flow, AI study mode Knowledge growing, paths unfold You and me, the perfect code In this gentle focus flow Focus flow, let the noise erode Quiet mind, productivity bestowed Together, clarity bestowed AI, guide my focus flow Gentle voice, digital guide In every thought, you’re by my side Together, now I clearly see The best of learning—AI and me Focus flow, deep and clear AI whisper, always near Quiet mind, steady stream Studying within this dream
